text: To determine whether rVV - N25 treatment induced the same effect in other strains of HCV transgenic mice , we analyzed RzCN5 - 15 ( + / 2 ) / MxCre ( + / 2 ) mice , which express all HCV proteins ; in these mice , chronic hepatitis was resolved within 28 days of immunization with rVV - N25 . Taken together , these findings indicated that rVV - N25 had a dramatic therapeutic effect on both types of HCV transgenic mice ( Figure S4 ) .
